    • save

      @PostMapping("/save") public java.lang.String save​(@Valid @Valid Person person, org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
      This method is to save user data and validate if error will send back to modify which is the update method or Index which is the homepage These 2 params must stay next to each other.
      Parameters:
      person - send object to store in Database
      errors - send back validation error class belongs to Spring Boot
      Returns:
      back to homepage localhots:8080

    • edit

      @GetMapping("/edit/{personId}") public java.lang.String edit​(Person person, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      This methos will be used to edit. It will search for a user/person using the personId variable with the service inteface IPersonService
      Parameters:
      person - is the user / object to be updated
      model - is the send date back to html
      Returns:
      the name of the param in the URL in this case it will take the user back to edit the user chosen
